author: dapplion
content: I had some informal chats throughout the week about full sending 2D now that we have an extra year.. Since we rely on supernodes to do reconstruction, the same assumption can be extended to 2D while we develop distributed reconstruction. We can use reqresp to sample over a (x,y) coordinate. Someone has a key obstacle I'm missing, or has a head-start on formalizing this direction?

author: jtraglia
content: A key obstacle would be the lack of a post-quantum KZG replacement that works with a 2D matrix. So if we decide to go full-das now, it would be much more difficult to swap out crypto schemes later on if necessary. For this reason, I believe we should stick with PeerDAS and try to develop a PQC replacement that works with full-das.
